Package ca.concordia.soen6441.d20.item

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    LevelUp
    This interface handles increasing the level of the character.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ability
    This is the Ability class.
    AbilityEntity
    Entity implementation class for Entity: AbilityEntity
    ArmorClass
    Each character of the game can wear an armor for protection and to use it in fights.
    ArmorClassEntity
    Entity implementation class for Entity: ArmorClassEntity
    AttackBonus
    This class is used to compute attack bonus of the character in each combat.
    AttackBonusEntity
    Entity implementation class for Entity: AttackBonusEntity
    DamageBonus
    This class represents damage bonus that character gets from his combats.
    DamageBonusEntity
    Entity implementation class for Entity: DamageBonusEntity
    HitPoint
    Hit points measure how hard character is to kill.
    HitPointEntity
    Entity implementation class for Entity: HitPointEntity
    Item
    every new Item class represent an actual item .
    ItemEntity
    Entity implementation class for Entity: ItemEntity
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbilityEnum
    This class represents all the type of abilities that character of the game can gain.
    AttributeEnum
    This class represents three different type of bonuses that character can gain.
    ItemEnum
    This class represents all kinds of items that each character can wear or have in its backpack.
